mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(SUBSTRING(TEMAVG, 1, 5))AS TEM_AVG, COALESCE(SUBSTRING(HUMAVG, 1, 5))AS HUM_AVG, DATE_FORMAT(DAYS.DAY, '%m월 %d일') AS DAY FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 5 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') AS DAY UNION ALL SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 4 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') UNION ALL SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') UNION ALL SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 2 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') UNION ALL SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') ) AS DAYS LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DATE(DATE_TIME) AS DAY, AVG(temperature) AS TEMAVG, AVG(HUMIDITY) AS HUMAVG FROM temandhum WHERE DATE_TIME < CURDATE() AND DATE_TIME >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 5 DAY) GROUP BY DATE(DATE_TIME) ) AS temandhum ON DAYS.DAY = temandhum.DAY GROUP BY DAY(DAYS.DAY) ORDER BY DAY(DAYS.DAY);
